website_summaries.verdict: An incredibly sturdy fabric basket for those looking for a lightweight shopping tool.
pros: Available to purchase in 3 color choices
3 built-in pockets line interior for holding belongings
One zippered pocket lays outside bag
cons: Does not stand upright on its own

customer_reviews.title: Better than reusable bags!
customer_reviews.text: Forget taking in a wad of mismatched reusable bags into the store, this foldable basket makes it super easy to unfold, shop, checkout, and rebag and carry all your items with the same product. Very sturdy (held 2 bottles of wine and goceries for dinner). I no longer have to grab the hand baskets and stuff my bags into it which takes up room. I highly recommend as a better alternative to reusable bags. Even great to take to a potluck, work, or other activities.
customer_reviews.author: Marty J.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and handy with one caveat.
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I dislike about it is that there is no "stop" when it is opened. Therefore, the only thing that keeps it from collapsing are the items contained in it. If there are only a few, and pretty small, the sides want to sink back down. It's ok when you're carrying it but put it down and down go the sides and things can spill/roll out of it. It's not a deal breaker though because it's roomy, sturdy and easily stored. Just a suggestion for the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: I have every color
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these baskets...I have several in a variety of colors. I didn't have Black, but now I do. Each color holds something different for my Commercial Cleaning Biz. Very sturdy, easy to hold. Durability is not an issue at all. I have no problems with these collapsing or falling down. They fold Great, but I keep 25 to 36oz plastic spray bottles in each...which can hold 8 bottles altogether. Side pockets come in handy for essential oils I use. These baskets last a very long time.
customer_reviews.author: Alayna W.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Handy Folding Basket
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item just to pick up different items around the house. Found this basket to be a great grocery basket. Carrying items to and from the car. Basket is well constructed with a little zip pouch on the side for coupons or credit cards etc. Liked this so much I've purchased 3 all together and I'm about to purchase more for friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: This basket is a gem! So well made. It folds easily and holds just the right amount when shopping for just a few items. My local grocery store never has enough hand baskets so I bought my own and I'm so glad I did. This is a great item and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: The basket itself is okay, but flimsy! I0t lacks folding hinges, a frame and a "floor" component to give it stability and structure. It will not stand alone. It collapses if set down. It only retains its shape if being hand held. Beware! If you are looking for something sturdy, yet foldable, this basket is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sadly 2 Stars
customer_reviews.text: The handle does not lock. When you set your basket down it folds in on itself automatically. I wish the handle would lick in to place with an easy release then I would have given it a higher rating. I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Daysgobydsr

customer_reviews.title: Great basket
customer_reviews.text: Use this for our local farmers market or picking up smaller items at our CSA farm share. Love the zip pocket where I can put my phone or keys. Perfect size and like the padded handle. It folds up easily for storage in my car and I just use the kitchen sprayer to wash it out after each use & let it air dry.
customer_reviews.author: mec1026

customer_reviews.title: Great basket
customer_reviews.text: My friends have these and they took it everywhere. I had to get one and find many uses for it. Wish it had an outside compartment on both sides. Really comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: b cole

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 starts except that it tends to collapse on itself until one has it quite full. Not a big problem, but a sturdy little hook would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: great basket
customer_reviews.text: Stands up on its own when it's empty. Only gave it 4 stars because the description says 3 inside pockets, but it only has one zipper pocket on the outside. Easy to fold and unfold. Comfy handle
customer_reviews.author: Gillock

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go in and out of our camper instead of making multiple trips. This little basket is awesome perfect for what we need. Easy to fold sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa M. Ruhl

customer_reviews.title: A good little carry bag
customer_reviews.text: This is very convenient for carrying miscellaneous small stuff out to the garage for permanent storage. It could also be used as a market basket to carry in a car.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Blanck

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this so I don't have to use the baskets at the store. Super sturdy, but light, and easy to fold. I'll be buying another one for my parents!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: I've bought three of them and they never disappoint. They hold quite a bit of weight and stay standing up for the baggers (which makes their day).
customer_reviews.author: kcloring

customer_reviews.title: Folds great,  comfortable handle. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to harvest in my garden. The outside pocket is great for my pruning shears, and the handle is super comfortable when carrying! Love this!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plastic bag ban
customer_reviews.text: We just banned plastic bags and this is their best way to be able to comfortably carry groceries. Just makes sense
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Dee

customer_reviews.title: Shopping basker
customer_reviews.text: Easy to store in car. Can carry purchases out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Diana H.

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Had to add cardboard to the sides to make it stand up. Otherwise great product.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Timmons

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful basket
customer_reviews.text: Love it everyone comments and asks where I got it from. I don't like shopping carts very germy. Very durable purchased a second so I have a spare when my original wears out. Folds up to small space. Can't say enough good things about this basket.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: I like it. This is durable and folds up nicely ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for bringing up all my ingredients for homemade products. I like it. This is durable and folds up nicely for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke within a week
customer_reviews.text: The handle snapped in half after about a week of use.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the basket.Its well made and a great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I had higher expectations. It collapses too easily, when I'd rather it stayed up. One cannot fold down the handle without collapsing the basket, making storage when full difficult. I had hoped for something similar to a harvest basket I have that also collapses, but has an internal frame to keep it from doing so when not desierd.
customer_reviews.author: DiggerGirl

customer_reviews.title: I am rather disappointed with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these: one for me & one for a gift. Although they were an affordable price, I am rather disappointed with the quality. The basket frame does not seem to hold up. One side often falls down and it seems quite weak. The more I use it, the more it gets. My advice is spend the extra money to get a better quality and stronger basket.
customer_reviews.author: Travers Aylsworth

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy a better quality if you want it for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: This item slouches badly. It didn't fold properly all the time and after a couple uses one of the "feet" fell off exposing a screw. I LOVE the idea but bought a better quality tote with a folding handle and stints to keep it up right.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I live on a very small island in the Caribbean that has just banned the use of plastic bags (good) .. Leaving you with only one option at checkout: byo. Now, with these market baskets I'm a rockstar. Very well-made
customer_reviews.author: del Toro

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Lock Into Position When In Use
customer_reviews.text: This item folds in on it self too easily even when full. It does not hold it’s shape well & slouches too much. I wish it snapped or locked into place when in use.
customer_reviews.author: lizard0922

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy hand basket
customer_reviews.text: Great basket. I use it to collect my veggies from the garden.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Campeau

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: In the time of COVID...your own basket comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Arlington, VA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made, sturdy and folds up nicely for easy storage!
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a joke, wish I actually used it
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Hagler

customer_reviews.title: Carry
customer_reviews.text: Great for the few items in the store folds to fit under back seat
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked the sides of the basket to stand up a little better however overall the basket is great. I bought it to hold items on my lap while in my wheelchair.
customer_reviews.author: Pinkie Greathouse

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and portable
customer_reviews.text: I use it to bring items to the refrigerator in garage and it is very sturdy and folds very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Diana D.

customer_reviews.title: These baskets are the best!
customer_reviews.text: I've had 4 of these baskets so far. I use them almost every day from shopping (of course!), to just carrying things around the house. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Best idea yet
customer_reviews.text: Nice and portable and I can use in any store for impromptu shopping. I don't have to use those sticky, nasty, "what was in this" supermarket baskets that can make my items stick to my hands or leave residue in my reusable shopping bags. I love the padded handle and can stuff my coupons in the cell phone pocket so I don't forget them. It's lighter weight than store baskets, not clumsy and I know where its been.
customer_reviews.author: Raia M

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Can only find one zipped outside pocket, there's no other pockets per description. Seller should update product info.
customer_reviews.author: CML

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Use this for grocery shopping and packing food to prep at relatives houses
customer_reviews.author: Tianni Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Well made carry all bag for multiple occasions. I use it for groceries.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small shopping trips or a little picnic or ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small shopping trips or a little picnic or even visiting someone house. My family uses it at least 4 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Maree Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Needed for my important things that I carry around the house (wheelchair bound)
customer_reviews.author: lady M

customer_reviews.title: Perfect car organizer
customer_reviews.text: I keep one in the car with umbrella, tissues,wipes, water .
customer_reviews.author: CNY Girl

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Great sturdy material. Easy to fold. Great for quick trips to the store especially when there aren’t any baskets available.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Not so compact folding basket.
customer_reviews.text: The plastics and maybe the adhesives employed in manufacturing have a very strong gasoline like oder. It seems to dissipate over time, but what a lousy first impression. Over the construction is durable.
customer_reviews.author: Big Billy

customer_reviews.title: Great basket!
customer_reviews.text: We like eating outside. This is great for carrying needed "stuff" from the RV to the table. The way it folds makes it perfect!
customer_reviews.author: PM

customer_reviews.title: Collapses When Set Down
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to fold but it collapses when you set it down even when full.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Now I don’t have to chase down the grocery store baskets. Very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: This item is definitely collapsible.
customer_reviews.text: This will collapse if you set it down and anything that is large will fall out.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Colliere

customer_reviews.title: Everybody wants to buy this from me when I go ...
customer_reviews.text: Everybody wants to buy this from me when I go to the farmers market or to the grocery store. Well made and very handy. Just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: ZeldaRia

customer_reviews.title: Great for grocery shopping in an area where they charge ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for grocery shopping in an area where they charge for bags - just the right size and stores easily.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen W

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this basket! It's terrific for those small trips to the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Allyn M. O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it
customer_reviews.text: Use it all the time, comes in very handy. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great to display items. Not sturdy enough to stand alone.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Quality, classy option to replace store bags
customer_reviews.text: This is the best investment after the new shopping bag charge began in my area. I love being able to shop with it (rather than using store hand baskets, ick!). Very good quality! I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: They are wonderful, easy to carry in the car as they ...
customer_reviews.text: I already have one and bought these three for gifts. They are wonderful, easy to carry in the car as they collapse and hold more than you might want to carry. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny Dulay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful basket to take to the store or veggie market. Collapses into a small square. Seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: susaninalaska

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on August 22 and on October 3 the black plastic part that holds the two sides and handle together broke. I'm a traveling teacher so I use this to carry my teaching supplies between my 5 schools. On October 7 the plastic on the other side broke as well. So now it is completely useless as it just flops about and stuff falls out.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love my little basket, perfect for going to the farmers market or picnicking.
customer_reviews.author: Pekira

customer_reviews.title: perfect basket
customer_reviews.text: This basket is wonderful. It is very strong and a great size. I use it at the supermarket, farmers' market or just for moving stuff in and out of my car.
customer_reviews.author: jchem42

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it, I just wish the handle folded down.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Car Organized and Clean
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for carrying odds and ends from the house to the car and vice versa. Keeps everything corralled and neat. Folds and stores under the seat when I'm not using it.
customer_reviews.author: Therease Silvabaroã

customer_reviews.title: Receiving order was fast, I only wish I had ...
customer_reviews.text: Receiving order was fast, I only wish I had notice the polyester fabric can not be removed for cleaning or to personalize it.
customer_reviews.author: SACONDA BAIRD

customer_reviews.title: I like it but....
customer_reviews.text: I would really love this basket if it would stand up better on it's own. When it's empty or has something small and light in it, it collapses too easily. It will do for now but I would really love to find something similar that would stand up better and have a handle that could be folded to down to make it easier to put stuff in and out
customer_reviews.author: Mary Hill

customer_reviews.title: Awesome carry all
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Heavy duty canvas material. It's the same size as a standard retail shopping basket. The carry handle is covered in rubber like material which makes it comfortable to carry. Very light weight. I love that it folds in half and stores nicely. Just wish there was some type of snack feature to help keep it closed when folded. Great carry all. I'm glad I purchased it!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Checkmate, Food Lion.
customer_reviews.text: Food Lion (our grocery store), in their “infinite wisdom”, took away the hand baskets and small push carts in the wake of the COVID crap. If they were actually sanitizing the carts, I’d understand, but, they’re not. I got these because I’m tired of pushing a giant cart through the store for just a couple things. They’re perfect!
customer_reviews.author: The Optick Nerve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for quick grocery runs...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for quick trips to the grocery store (or farmers market if currently allowed). I use this so often, I bought another for my son (who refuses to use grocery carts right now to due possible COVID germs). I line the inside with a kitchen garbage bag, fits perfectly. That way I don't have to sanitize after each use.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: useful
customer_reviews.text: I replace with this model every once in a while. They hold up well, but can't be thoroughly cleaned if used for carrying bedding plants, etc. Eventually, the sidewalls collapse a bit but they are still useful for grocery shopping so I don't have to deal with recycling plastic grocery bags.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jeffus

customer_reviews.title: ... of a fan I think a hard bottom is better for shopping with
customer_reviews.text: It works but not as much of a fan I think a hard bottom is better for shopping with. The basket is nice thanks to CA law it mostly sits in the trunk of a car incase I forget a basket now when shopping. The collapsible nature make it idea for leaving in the car
customer_reviews.author: GotAFarmYetTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my u-picking outting!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Sturdy, large capacity, light weight to carry, easy to clean, and simple to pack up for storage. Went u-picking at a local farm for potatoes and flowers and it was perfect for my outting! I love the side pocket. I was able to put extra bags and even my clippers in it.
customer_reviews.author: Tearose

customer_reviews.title: Does not stay Standing
customer_reviews.text: When I have items in the basket and set it on the floor the side drop down and depending on the item in the basket will fall out. Was given as a gift and the receiver was very unhappy, so I got it back only to find out that I am unable to return the item for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Henderson

customer_reviews.title: The perfect reusable shopping bag!  Go green!
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of these baskets. They're perfect for grocery shopping. When I only have a few items to pick up, I even use it as my basket inside the store. All the checkout baggers love my basket too, because it's easy for them to fill. Collapsible for easy storage in my car too! Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.author: imjustsaying

customer_reviews.title: Plan to order more!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I am constantly carting things to and from work and usually feel like a bag lady. This cute basket holds EVERYTHING! It fits my lunch, paperwork, my wallet, phone and all sorts of odds and ends. I will probably buy more in different colors. It's also great to leave in the steps for things to take upstairs or down. It's well made and stylish. It also collapses nicely when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole in NJ

customer_reviews.title: Love this basket
customer_reviews.text: Love this basket! Folds up very easily. The zip pocket is too small for my whole wallet but it works just fine for cash/cards and my keys. I've had it for about 3 months now and it is holding up very nicely. Thinking about buying another one in a different color :)
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Very unstirdy
customer_reviews.text: This bag is extremely unstable. Even if you fill it with a lot of stuff (I have my kids lunch boxes, snacks and water bottles) it always falls over in the car and the things are falling out. Don't even think about just have 1 or 2 small things in it because the bag will just automatically fall together. The only good thing about it is that it easily becomes flat and you can store it away. I would never recommend this bag to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena Thomasson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for small trips
customer_reviews.text: I love this collapsing basket. It is perfect for small shopping trips and it fits perfectly on my Rolator (walker).
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Great basket!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these this year for Christmas gifts. I have had one similar for a couple of years and people kept commenting on it and asking where I got it. So I gave them filled with wine, cheese and what not as gifts. Although the giftee's were appreciative of the contents, they were over joyed with the basket itself! Great product and happy to have found these here on Amazon. I use mine all the time for grocery shopping and just hauling things from the car.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: I don't make a trip to the grocery store without it anymore.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself then bought one for my mom. It's perfect to use nowadays (in this pandemic era). It can carry a heavy amount. I had a box of Tide detergent and two six packs of soda in it once. It's easy to fold and store away. I'll buy another one :)
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: which is really annoying. I thought it was because it wasn't quite ...
customer_reviews.text: The basket starts to collapse when it's set on the ground/floor, which is really annoying. I thought it was because it wasn't quite full, but not the case. Regardless of how much you have in the basket, it will start to smoosh down--I bought this one because of the price point but I would have been better off paying $10 more for the baskets with the reinforced sides.
customer_reviews.author: MW13

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality basket.  Just wish it was more rigid when opened.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the bottom was more rigid when the basket is fully open. As it is, it tends to want to sag a bit. Over all, though, it's quality made, light-weight, and easy to collapse and store in a small space. And it fits perfectly on my lap while wheeling my wheelchair in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Llama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grocery shopping
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for grocery shopping rather use this than those dirty baskets at the grocery store
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Delapina

customer_reviews.title: Nice big bag
customer_reviews.text: Use this to carry work stuff and my lunch. Love it! Stands up even with nothing in it
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Wish the handle could collapse
customer_reviews.text: Great for organizing around the house and it looks nice and the black blends in and isn't an eyesore. Just wish the handle could collapse while leaving the basket open.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Meals On Wheels delivery
customer_reviews.text: I got this for Meals on Wheels delivery. I spent $1 at DollarTree to buy a piece of plastic to put in the bottom to help with meal spillage. The basket works great for meal delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Comstock

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic little basket. Aluminum frame and handle. The handle has a very soft rubbery material around it with easy grip croves. The basket itself is made of a very strong fabric. It will stand up very easily by itself. It has a lot of room inside. Can easily hold more than one twelve inch pizza. Can hold 20 pounds with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Shodan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shopping basket
customer_reviews.text: I selected this item as a birthday day gift for my husband. He wanted a shopping basket type carrier for carrying items like foods, casseroles, misc items. A tote bag did not have enough structure and had to be opened numerous times to load objects. Of course, I liked that idea and purchased one for me too. We both think the baskets are handy, easy to use and store. If the bottom support was a little stronger, the basket would be perfect. The cushioned handles are also a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: This is a little smaller than one I already have. I gave it to a two year old who always takes mine a pretend it is a shopping cart. Then her parents started using it! It makes carrying thing easy.
customer_reviews.author: Audra

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 and enjoy what I’ve seen so far. The women in my family have been using the expensive German version of this bag for years and I’m happy to have some that I can beat up and not worry about!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Teacher Bag
customer_reviews.text: Simply because I am a teacher who could never figure out a comfortable carry on bag ... I came across this! Voila it works - I throw stuff in there with all my papers, books, and even alunch bag. It all nicely fits in there, and could not make me happier! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Small for me
customer_reviews.text: I should have looked at the measurements. I can’t fit bowls and casseroles.
customer_reviews.author: JDL

customer_reviews.title: Great for picking up a few things
customer_reviews.text: This is great for light shopping trips. I put everything on the belt at checkout and then handed the basket to the checker who filled it up as she rang up my items. Easy peasy! I love this thing
customer_reviews.author: Kathie Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Great baskets to take grocery shopping
customer_reviews.text: Great baskets to take grocery shopping. I keep these folded up in the back of my car and take into my local market. Also great to line your grocery cart with to keep groceries separated by category.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Keep it folded up in the back of my car. Nice little tote. Although i dont abuse it, this tote looks and feels tough. I expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Beau W.

customer_reviews.title: great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice little basket sturdy makes going to the store for little things a breeze
customer_reviews.author: Robert Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Handy little basket
customer_reviews.text: My only transportation is a motor scooter so when I go to the store I can't carry many items. This basket folds up and is easy to carry or store when not in use. Some of the stores in my neighborhood don't seem to have many hand baskets. This basket is a perfect fit for me and gets used quite a bit .
customer_reviews.author: RussellC

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Bag
customer_reviews.text: This collapsible bag is great at work! I have to wipe off counters/desks and I put wipes or other cleansers in it while walking around the office. When I'm done, I store it flat in my cabinet to prevent others from taking it.
customer_reviews.author: TriceyLeigh

customer_reviews.title: Don’t leave home without it!
customer_reviews.text: Wouldn’t go to the supermarket without it! This bag is durable, easy to use, and save thousands of plastic bags a year. It collapses for easy storage in my car.
customer_reviews.author: T. J. Whartenby

customer_reviews.title: Basket collapses on itself as there is no supporting structure ...
customer_reviews.text: Basket collapses on itself as there is no supporting structure to hold it open. Returned this item and that process was smooth.
customer_reviews.author: CRogers

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: It is a decent size. Will stand on it's own, but obviously if it's empty the sides collapse. Has a small side pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I had hoped. Also, The handle is made well, but is always up. I'm in a wheelchair and would have this sitting in my lap. I'll probably give the thing away.
customer_reviews.author: Dewed

product_meta.title: RSVP International Collapsible Market Basket, Black | Aluminum Frame | Polyester Fabric | Large Zippered Compartmet | Space-Saving Storage, One Size
product_meta.description: Color:BlackRSVP strives to offer quality kitchen products and cooking tools at competitive prices. Our market basket is a perfect example. This basket is the perfect solution for groceries, farmers market produce, picnics, gardening supplies, or toys. Made with a strong, yet lightweight aluminum frame and polyester fabric with a large zippered compartment on the outside. The soft foam rubber handle provides a nice, comfortable grip. Folding it up and storing it couldn’t be simpler, just flatten and fold in half. Overall size is 17-inches by 11-inches by 9-inches. Spot clean when needed and let air dry. When all the right people, and ingredients, kitchen tools, and food come together, we call this The Art of Gathering.
feature_bullets: QUALITY MATERIALS: Made with a strong, yet lightweight aluminum frame and polyester fabric with a large zippered compartment on the outside to hold your phone, money or wallet
MULTIFUNCTIONAL: The Perfect solution for groceries, farmers market produce, picnics, gardening supplies, knitting yarn or toys
EASY STORAGE: Folding it up and storing it couldn’t be simpler, just flatten and fold in half for space saving convenience
EASY CLEAN: Spot clean when needed and let air dry
